about_the_game:
Home is where your pet is happy! Enjoy new furniture and decoration pieces and transform your farm into a Pet Paradise.

Interior design
These new furniture and decorations are a must have for all pet lovers. Get a new cozy bed for yourself but, of course, also for your furry friend and discover the most woof-able decoration pieces: a scratch tree, a pet playhouse, a catwalk set, a feed dispenser and so much more.

Exterior decorations
Decorate your farm with these great animal trimmed hedges and everyone will notice on a first glimpse that you are a pet lover!
